name: claude-prompts
description: Reusable prompt templates with quality gates and multi-step workflows for consistent AI outputs
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server providing prompt templates, quality gates, chain workflows, and methodology frameworks (CAGEERF, ReACT). Features include hot-reload for live editing, symbolic command syntax (>>prompt --> >>chain), and inline gate validation for consistent AI outputs.

tools.name: prompt_engine
tools.description: Execute prompts with frameworks, gates, and chains. Supports symbolic syntax (>>prompt --> >>chain).

tools.name: resource_manager
tools.description: CRUD operations for prompts, gates, and methodologies. Manage templates and workflows.

tools.name: system_control
tools.description: Framework management, analytics, status, and configuration inspection.
